item.title: How I Built My Personal Website with Hugo & LoveIt
item.author: kathir@mikcore.com (Kathiravan Muthaiah)
item.description: A step-by-step journey of creating my personal website using Hugo, LoveIt theme, GitHub Pages, and a custom subdomain.
